mapper.select: select AVG(score) as average, aptName, aptCode from apt_score group by aptCode order by average DESC, aptName limit 10
mapper.insert: insert into apt_score(memberId, aptCode, aptName, score) values (#{memberId}, ${aptCode}, #{aptName}, ${score})
mapper.delete: delete from apt_score where memberId = #{memberId} and aptCode = #{aptCode}
